answers.answer: Families with children with disabilities need more material and psychological resources during times of war and emergencies.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/taking-care-of-children-with-disabilities and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Families can best prepare by assembling an emergency suitcase with essential items and by preparing children with autism or mental disorders for situations like explosions or bomb shelters.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/taking-care-of-children-with-disabilities and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: An emergency suitcase for a child with a disability should include a strategic first aid kit for 3-4 weeks, special food, hygiene products for toilet difficulties, and special equipment like wheelchairs if possible.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/taking-care-of-children-with-disabilities and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Enough specialized food or infant formula should be taken to have a reserve if a child has a special diet or eating disorder.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/taking-care-of-children-with-disabilities and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Critical hygiene products for children with toilet difficulties include diapers, disposable diapers, and remedies for bedsores and intertrigo.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/taking-care-of-children-with-disabilities and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Special equipment like wheelchairs or stretchers should be taken during evacuation if they are required and it is possible to do so.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/taking-care-of-children-with-disabilities and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Children with autism spectrum disorders can be prepared by teaching them to take cover in a makeshift "hut", using headphones for sensitive hearing, and by parents maintaining calmness and routine.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/taking-care-of-children-with-disabilities and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: A parent's calmness is crucial because children with autism react strongly to adult emotions, while adhering to a daily routine provides stability and is very important during a crisis.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/taking-care-of-children-with-disabilities and read the page carefully.
